name: HeartBeat (OpenDoresGaming, KelwalaBear, StevyOcean, Markyaba)
description:
Headphones And A Dark Room Are Highly Recommended

You have woken up in a foreign place. It is too dark to see, and your girlfriend is nowhere to be found. The only things you can hear are your heartbeat, and the cries of creatures in the distance. You need to find her, and make sure she is safe.

WASD - Basic  Movement

E - Interactions

LShift - Sprint

L CTRL - Sneak

Credits 

Markus Baars - Project Lead and Programming

Kel Parke - Animation And 3D Art

Steven Rzenca - Game Design, Sound, And Programming

Will Dores - UI And Programming

This game was made for #BrackeysGameJam2. As per the rules, every asset in this game (with the exception of the font) is made by us. We use custom shaders and materials, self recorded sounds, and self made Art and animations.

The font we used can be found here: https://www.dafont.com/de/horror-sketch.font
